website_summaries.verdict: This model offers hassle-free operation with a compact and portable design.
pros: The unit has an auto mode, as well as cool, dehumidify and fan
Removes up to 71 pints of water per day
Cools and dehumidifier for rooms up to 450 square feet
cons: Some units arrived without the window kit
Unit does not self-evaporate as expected

customer_reviews.title: Almost as loud as Stephen A. Smith
customer_reviews.text: I only run it on really hot days. I installed it in my living room window below the TV (only place it could really go). It cools down the room quick but is kind of loud. I can live with the noise, but if I ran it constantly I think it could get old fast. If you have a bigger room and a window far away from where your tv or couch is, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MRMills

customer_reviews.title: Delivery of product with missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertised as New but the box had been tapped together at the bottom suggesting it had been previously opened and repackaged. Upon my receipt of the item, the window slider kit was missing and the exhaust hose readily detached from the plastic end fitting (not the detachable adapters for the window and unit). For the price of the system, I'm disappointed in the troublesome processes I'm now having to work in an attempt to obtain replacement parts. I'm also very disappointed in the apparent false advertisement of the condition of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my grow room cool!
customer_reviews.text: I use this unit in my fully legal 10x10 indoor grow room with (4) 1,000 watt lights. This unit has been running for 12 hours per day for the past 10 days and it works perfectly. My grow room stays 77 during the day with 4 lights running and me working in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Rasta Jeff

customer_reviews.title: 85 degrees outside all summer,70 degrees inside easy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps or 1k sqr foot apt very cool all summer
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Sisco

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Took our apartment from well over 90 degrees to a very comfortable 75 on the hottest days during a heatwave. The self-evaporating system worked without a hitch even on the most humid of days. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: domenica

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this portable AC purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. My only caution would be it is louder than anticipated, which doesn’t bother me, but could be a factor for others considering this purchase (if you want something quiet or silent, this is not it).
customer_reviews.author: G. Art

customer_reviews.title: Accessing front vents
customer_reviews.text: Okay I spoke too soon about accessing vents it seems when u turn the unit on the panel automatically raises on its own so cool and Unit works as expected although I have not run it on a hot day
customer_reviews.author: P. Correnti

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Cooled room within seconds of turning unit on. Window slider was missing. I spoke with Jackie from whynter customer service. She was very polite and helpful. She went above and beyond to help me get this problem resolved. I would definitely purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnda Quillen

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love this air conditioner. I am highly upset that I received it damaged right out of the box. I was hoping the manufacturer would send replacement parts, but unfortunately they did not. I am unable to haul this 80+ pound thing to get shipped back for a replacement. I know the damage is just cosmetic, but it's a major bummer especially when you shell out over 500 bucks for it. 9/25/2020 I was able to get replacement parts through the warranty. Company was quick to replace them and at no extra charge.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed 13.5k btu
customer_reviews.text: Shipment took forever. UPS held my package at a facility for at least 5 days. Finally got here today. 1. Impressive low noise level at highest speed. Quieter than LG 10kBtu. 2. False information: box said 13500btu. Amazon said 14000btu. 3. After testing at 100f, performance is low. It sustains at 78f for 450 sf. 4. Air shoots up where unit is at and is unadjustable. Overall, I’m not too happy with the performance in TX. I expect more from 13k vs 10k btu.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very cold and easy install
customer_reviews.text: I live in Texas where days get over 100 degrees and I have a 390 sf garage converted to tv room and this AC keeps it cold!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hines

customer_reviews.title: Nice n cool.
customer_reviews.text: I just set it up in my living room with cathedral ceiling. I had a Frigidaire for ten years. That one was great. But did it suck the electric. The bulbs dimmed when it kicked on. But it finally died. So we got this one. It's quiet and uses less electric and blows cold air. So far happy with it. If anything changes I will update.
customer_reviews.author: fafhrd

customer_reviews.title: Good cooling
customer_reviews.text: This is our third portable AC unit. It cools our room better than the previous 2. However, it is more BTU's as well. It is quieter. The insert into the window fits better. I really like the "rotating" vent. The "follow me" function with the remote is really handy. It cools until the temperature is at the established temperature at the remotes position in the room.
customer_reviews.author: C & J P

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: My room was significantly hotter then the other rooms in the house regardless of the temperature the thermostat was set at. Now it's like one of the walk-in fridge coolers at gas stations. Obviously, there are more functions than just being cold. We tested it out in our garage to see if we could keep it cool and dehumidify it and it worked great. Noise isn't terribly loud but if you have the setting at the lowest temp and highest fan speed you'll definitely know its there. For sleeping, I keep it on the lowest temp and lowest fan speed and you can hear it but it's not overbearing and you get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: JHale

customer_reviews.title: Recall needed
customer_reviews.text: Warning to any existing owners or,please think twice before purchasing one of these units!! This is a fairly expensive unit.It worked well until it started burning!!! Quess what,the warranty is only for 1 year.I was lucky to be in the room when it started burning and unplugged and moved it outside.There is a real problem with either design or parts used. Can you say recall?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: High output and noise is what you would expect for the amount of cold air it puts out. I have the unit outside my bedroom and it doesn't keep me awake. I have 1,900 sq. ft. on two levels and this unit, with the help of two ceiling fans and one box fan keep the whole house cool enough. At 100 deg. outside, the house got up to 75 deg. max.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit!! Go nowhere else!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this works like a charm! Completely blown away (pun intended) by this product. It gets the bedroom ice cold in a jiffy. Very easy to install. Love the remote and digital display.
customer_reviews.author: ShopsAlot

customer_reviews.title: very effective in cooling down a big room with high ceiling
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner is really worth its BTU rating, unlike that Delonghi brand carried by Costco. I have tried both, and found that this Wynter brand works much much better than that Delonghi brand in cooling a big bedroom room with a high ceiling very quickly. Why didn't I buy this one first? Very happy to have found this one on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ycarol

customer_reviews.title: Cools the room down!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on Wednesday morning and had it by 11:00 AM the next day, no kidding. Our living room is 20x30 and wanted an air conditioner that would help cool things down. Outside is has been in the mid nineties, and up to 87 in our living room by evening. Today is the first day with this air conditioner and the temperature is 75 in the living room. I do not expect it to get ice cold in this room, but 75 is much better than 87. I love it, and by the way, the dogs are not panting in the house today!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Royce

customer_reviews.title: Easy and a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: We got it on the hottest day of the year! (Than you UPS) Very easy to hook up and cooled the room down quickly! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of lugging that huge window unit around, this portable AC is the perfect solution! Wheels out of the way when not in use. Easy to set up, and works great! The sleep mode is a nice feature!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hiebert

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I had a fun time installing this. And this cooled my home office allowing me to better focus on my work. I no longer have to work in 80+ degrees F humid temperatures. This cools my office to even below 70. I also feel like the air quality has improved tremendously for me as well. Although that may be loving the product so much that I feel like I am breathing better lol.
customer_reviews.author: Md O. Farooq

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Good Unit.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a month now and am pretty pleased with it. No portable air conditioner is going to be noise free. Just get used to it. Seems to cool well. Nice remote control. Easy set up and quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: It sucks. It fooled me the first day but it just isn’t any good. How do you even return something like this? Ugh
customer_reviews.author: MeezieMar

customer_reviews.title: Saved my life
customer_reviews.text: My Big Unit died after 40 years. Was expecting it to take awhile to replace. This Unit Does a Great Job even over a very large area. All my window units were only useful if I was in the same room or standing right in front of it. Highly recommend this unit if you are looking for something like this. DO NOT even try the Evaporative.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of BTU’s and it only cooled a 12x10 room in a well insulated house on an 85’ day. Not happy can’t wait to get electric bill. My little window a/c did a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Unit doesn’t cool
customer_reviews.text: It does not cool our room above the garage and I can’t get help from customer service. I type them a response to them it goes away. They are saying if I don’t response they will disconnect. Unit does not cool
customer_reviews.author: Tonya  Glover

customer_reviews.title: I guess?
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product in a 4x8 grow tent and it does great at cooling but I've been forced to add a dehumidifier because it Jack's the humidity up to 80-90%. Could definitely use better controls I'd like to cool and dehumidify instead of have to choose between the 2.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It cools off the first floor of my house!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item from Amazon warehouse with a very good discount. It came in total damaged box. I was skeptical. However, the air conditioner was completely secured by the styrofoam around it. I made sure to let it stay upright for 24 hours before using it. The window installation kit was easy to install. It works perfectly fine blowing out cool air. I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VHTK

customer_reviews.title: good for cooling
customer_reviews.text: this unit is very good for cooling, but not very good at dehumidifying. very noisy
customer_reviews.author: only4me

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PICK FOR A PORTABLE AC
customer_reviews.text: KEEPS MY 2 BEDROOM APT COOL. LOVE IT, WILL RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: adelina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: Best portable AC unit I've experienced! Quiet and super effective!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet. Excellent product. I used it to cool my garage for a party this August. In South Louisiana August is hot. It did a good job of keeping the temp down. I'd buy it again if I needed another.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Very loud.
customer_reviews.text: I wear earplugs to bed normally. This item is extremely loud. I am 10 feet away, it’s on low and 58 decibels. I would not buy it again. Nor would I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This item causes a vacum and pulls hot air from outside
customer_reviews.text: Due to the single hose the item pulls hot air from the outside to cool the coil and causes the rest of the house to get hotter. I purchased this item to cool my server room but it pulled air in from the rest of the house that caused the home AC work harder to cool the rest of the house and causes the electric bill to sky rocket.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: Product came poorly put together
customer_reviews.text: Overall okay, but weirdly came with the top vent portion misaligned. Does not affect functionality but kind of annoying
customer_reviews.author: kwhite

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: it cools ok. no flap control, it does not go lower unless you force it.
customer_reviews.author: Morrlo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product From a Great Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Great AC unit! Purchased because our AC duct in Master is crap, did an amazing job it a large room. I heard this is the Cadillac of AC and it definitely lived up to its name!
customer_reviews.author: Emon

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in my room decor - operates very quietly for this many BTU's. Easy to use remote.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Carrig

customer_reviews.title: Got a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay for a week, then started making AWFUL noises. Thought it was going to explode. Amazon did an easy exchange but unfortunately we ate sitting here waiting in the middle of a heat wave.
customer_reviews.author: CCF

customer_reviews.title: has all the features i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: this Whynter air conditioner is doing a great job keeping my condo cool this summer. I like the energy saving feature. and no water to drain. it is heavy but it is on wheels. very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: peach

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my home cool. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It cools my house well. I love it. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: If you want a hassle buy this airconditioner
customer_reviews.text: Arrived cracked. I was shuffled back and forth between the manufacturer and Amazon. Havent used much because of concern of body housing crack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our space
customer_reviews.text: Just what we need for this summer. It is a little louder than expected, but I don't even care. As long as I'm staying cool I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great air conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It cools our 500ft area perfectly we turn on ceiling fan and it cools even further in our home!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well, zero issues so far, bought three of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad unit. The unit produces a lot of heat, make sure you get some aluminum tape for ducting and I used 1/2 pipe insulation for the top and bottom which provided a better seal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy air conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This is the loudest air conditioner that I have ever purchased if I knew it was this loud I would not have bought it. My wife cannot even sleep in our bedroom because of the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super loud and can even cool down a small apartment living room. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Cools as expected. Remote doesn’t consistently work Hooked up tube to drain into a bucket and no drainage for weeks and then it filled bucket to overflow
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cold air
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why people say its loud its very quiet. Blows nice cold air haven't got to test it much but it seems like a good product. I just cant seem to link the remote right now
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great value !!!
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner was a gift for my granddaughter (Faith), her mom says, " It cools and comfort the entire living room".
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another
customer_reviews.text: Works great, a little loud in the auto mode. In the dehumidifier mode works great. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Moses

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this air conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does a great job cooling our main living area. Quality construction and the unit is easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S.

customer_reviews.title: The window kit is not easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The ac unit works fine. But the delivery was delayed and there are a few broken pieces on the exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly, cools the room very quickly. I have been shopping around for Months and I am so glad I went with this unit. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well in our home
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in my bedroom where it stays warmer during the summer months and it’s working out great. A tad bit more noisy than I expected but still a nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrit

customer_reviews.title: Warranty & Refrigerant replacement concerns !
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell......Only been using it for 3 - 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ac is not 14000 btu ,it is 13500 btu
customer_reviews.text: charged me for a product which is not as strong
customer_reviews.author: lishman1

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Flawless operation out of the box all hardware included plug and play ;)
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit louder than I expected it to be ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit louder than I expected it to be and compared to my neighbors, who has a competing brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not cool well at all. After almost a year of of having owning this it sucks it honestly just sucks the amount of noise it puts out and how many watts it needs is huge. A 5k Btu window unit would do more cooling and be quieter. Unless you simply have no other option portable ac units are just aweful. Window units cool way better way more efficient and cost way less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that it would take up so much floor space. Also, the hard plastic that connects to the hole in the window kit sits on the window sill and prevents closing the window down onto the kit, so I will have to rig up some kind of additional insulation. It was so heavy (80 lbs), I will have trouble re-packaging it so I am debating whether to keep it or not. As for cooling ability, it's helpful but nothing like central air or a window AC.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ann

customer_reviews.title: Bought this quite a while ago in preparation for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this quite a while ago in preparation for the summer. Have used it on and off and more recently been having it on everyday. Really cools down the entire place very well, and has been reliable. No weird issues or anything of concern. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SSkull

customer_reviews.title: Not for Everybody
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a few issues: 1) It is not for people who have crank open windows. If that's the case, you will have to cut a hole in the wall to the outside to install a vent. You will have to buy a clothes dryer vent grating to prevent animals from entering, plus a dryer vent cover to prevent rain from leaking into it. 2) When set at the coldest level, the unit cooled a medium sized bedroom by 10/12 degrees. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: COOLEST AIR CONDITIONER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT/COLD Air Conditioner! Keeps the home (living room and 1 bedroom) in the 70's! I had an LG THAT OVERHEATED, and I did not know it, until later! It was repaired, then started overheating (wires, plug) again! It hurt my electricity-did not know it at the time! Very expensive to fix electrical! Warranty is over, LG will do NOTHING! That's why I LOVE THIS WYNTER AIR CONDITIONER!!!!! NO PROBLEMS!
customer_reviews.author: RAPTURE ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Update: Whynter resolved my issue above expectations! Top notch company!
customer_reviews.text: I was a return Whynter customer, and very pleased with this unit. I had some issues over how to resolve the problem, but as of the moment Whynter is really working to help me out. I'll update my review after it's all settled. *Whynter was great ! Lexie M. with Whynter worked with me to a more than satisfactory end. Everything made anywhere has a fluke bad one now and then, but I love this ac and am extremely pleased with the new one. I would not hesitate to recommend this or Whynter!
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: This is R32, not R410a
customer_reviews.text: Though the description says this uses R410a refrigerant, the item I received uses R32. This is probably due to R410a being phased out. Despite that, the unit seems to work fairly well... discharge temp is 37 degrees F in a garage whose ambient is 83 degrees F. This is only the unit's first day in service... I let it sit the recommended 4 hours prior to powering it up. Update 8/24/20: It continues to perform well inside a South Florida garage in the height of summer. I have not had to empty the condensation pan so it seems to be doing a good job evaporating the condensation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Use it in a space that is too large for it, but in the silly hot humid weather we have had the last month, keeps the temp and humidity down and the space comfortable. Does a great job of removing humidity and have never had to empty the tank with it vented to the outside.
customer_reviews.author: PhilvO

customer_reviews.title: Works great but produces a lot of water!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Doesn't seem to move as much air as my last 12k BTU one did but it is a lot quieter too. If you use the constant drain method during cooling, be prepared to empty the bucket a lot! We have more than half filled a 5 gallon bucket in less than 10 hours!
customer_reviews.author: S. Poole

customer_reviews.title: quiet! cold!
customer_reviews.text: Suffered for years with "quiet" window air conditioners. Bought this for hot humid son's room in Hawaii. Cooled quickly. Ultra quiet. Way better than a window unit. Way cheaper than split design. I thought all portables were noisey and ran hot. Highly rec.
customer_reviews.author: illwind

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy unit but is easy to set up. It does have an annoying bussy sound when AC is on. Otherwise is very quiet compared to my smaller bedroom unit. One thing, it will not cool large room down very fast but if you keep it on "Auto" at around 76 degrees F and just let it run, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: AlClemons

customer_reviews.title: One was good. The second was terrible. The question is which one is the outlier?
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and it was fairly quiet. I was happy about the purchase that I bought a second one. Total regret. We can't keep it on unless we're not in the room. It makes so much noise when the AC portion is activated. It's being returned immediately. Loud!
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: It really does put out AIR
customer_reviews.text: This is a first day review. Pros: Assembled easily, cools quite well, appearance is nice. Cons: it is NOISY. Good comparison-- a Hairdryer on "full" when cooling or "low" when fan only. It is acceptable but I did take off a star for it. There probably isn't much that could be done to make it quieter given what its has to do. The instructions were mostly good but the drain plugs (2 of them) set-up could be clearer. We're happy with it and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Readalot

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand what response you are looking for in terms of warmth and thickness. It is thicker than my old unit and thinner would be better. The unit is loud, much louder than my old one. It also just stops working --sometimes it starts again and sometimes I have to go over and restart it. It does keep my space cool. In the beginning, it seemed the remote input was not aligned with the on unit input. I'm not even sure where that is now. I just work with it until it does what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling height can affect the cooling performance
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat loud but didn’t affect my sleep. Unfortunately my bedroom is on the top floor with no attic above-only a tongue & groove poorly insulated cathedral 15’ ceiling & dark shingles (I live in Hawaii) so it couldn’t keep the room as cool as a room with a flat, lower, better insulated ceiling. However, I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Portable AC
customer_reviews.text: I am using this AC in my attic office. Works very well, not too noisy. The exhaust is very hot, so I insulated the line coming from the unit
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Fat Ugly Remote that doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The remote doesn’t work at all looks like it’s from the 80’s Cools my 250 square foot room ok
customer_reviews.author: SheilaT

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  I recommend that
customer_reviews.text: This is 2nd portable AC I have, and I run them 24/7. This cools quite well, filter is easy to clean, but I would recommend a more flexible air direction function to make it more so one can direct air flow. Easy to read function buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Nurseyann

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and cold
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work really good. Delivers a lot of cold air quick. I’m cooling about 400 sq ft of space with this unit and so far I didn’t have any problems using it at the tail end of summer. This next summer will be the true test, but I’m happy so far and didn’t notice much of an increase in my electric bill, so it’s fairly efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and works well
customer_reviews.text: We took a little chance when replaced another brand with the Whynter. I did not know the Whynter name but the unit got good reviews and it was priced competitively . I am glad that I did. It's a great unit that runs throughout the year in my company's server room. it gets a constant workout.
customer_reviews.author: Chesterbrewmeister

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With this and a couple of ceiling fans my tiny house gets cold.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Borbon

customer_reviews.title: Way way too loud - Compressor rattling
customer_reviews.text: Returned it as the DB level on this thing was way beyond the listed amount. I could hear nothing else in the room. It replaced an existing portable ac unit in the exact spot so I know what these should sound like. I have a feeling something was wrong with the compressor as it was super rattley and loud.
customer_reviews.author: Darin0088

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Very loud but cools down my family and laundry room. The remote does not work unless you start the unit with it. The timer does not totally turn it off...just the cooling part is turned off. The fan keeps going until you power it off.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great AC
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters bedroom since she has wonky windows in there. Easy to install. Great AC. I'll be getting one of these when my living room ac gives out.
customer_reviews.author: BevK

customer_reviews.title: ... portable air conditioner really produces cold air and we love it!
customer_reviews.text: This portable air conditioner really produces cold air and we love it!!! Vent it well and it will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Y.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Received it from UPS with damage to the box and missing 2 plastic shipping straps. The air flow cover was damaged. The unit works even though damaged. The listing advertises it at 14,000 btu however the Whynter manual the number is 13,500 for this model arc-148ms. Somewhat deceiving
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and keep my room very cool
customer_reviews.text: During this recent heatwave in the Northeast I have certainly enjoyed this portable air conditioner. Super convenient to assemble
customer_reviews.author: A. dot

customer_reviews.title: No draining unless it is very humid, so none so far.
customer_reviews.text: While using it as an air conditioner I never needed to drain it. The unit had no trouble cooling an area a little bigger than it’s rating.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bubenhofer

customer_reviews.title: Plug & Play!! Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy set up. Can roll between living room and bedroom. Notice difference immediately in 500 Sq Ft room! Happy Campers and our dog is Lov'n life too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Noel Smith

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! We're using it in a backup server room/network ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! We're using it in a backup server room/network closet. It's keeping it perfectly cool.
customer_reviews.author: flashdance

product_meta.title: Whynter ARC-148MS 14,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner, Dehumidifier, Fan with 3M and SilverShield Filter for Rooms up to 450 sq ft
product_meta.description: The ARC-148MS portable air conditioner provides superior 14,000 BTU cooling output while maintaining a compact and portable profile. This unit features advanced self-evaporating technology, which uses and recycles moisture collected during the cooling process to produce cool air and minimize condensation build-up. It also features an auto-restart function which allows it to automatically restart on the previous settings after a power outage. Additionally, the unit can also be programmed with a 24hr timer to activate or shut-off at preset times. This unit also features a separate dehumidifying mode that enables it to be used as a room dehumidifier as needed. A 3M Filter and Silver shield washable pre-filter are equipped standard on this air conditioner to help keep the cooled air cleaner and fresher. This highly functional unit combines smart styling and impressive cooling output for the most demanding applications. The Whynter ARC-148MS is recommended for spaces up to a 500 sq. ft. (ambient temperature and humidity may influence optimum performance).
feature_bullets: Four Operational Modes: Auto, Cool, Dehumidify, and Fan. Fan settings include 3 speeds with directional air discharge louvers
Adjustable temp (62 -88 degrees F), 24 hour programmable timer, 71 pints/day dehumidifying capacity with continuous and manual drain methods
Noise level: <55 dBA , air flow (at high speed): 497m3/h / 292 CFM
Maximum power consumption: 1580W / 11.9A, Power Supply: 115 V / 60Hz
UL listed, LCDI plug, R-410A refrigerant, single hose, 3M Filter and Silver shield washable pre-filter
Great option for keeping rooms up to 450 square feet cool and comfortable
Remote control, extendable exhaust hose (up to 59"), and upgraded plastic window kit (up to 48") included
Unit dimensions: 18.5″ W x 15.75″ D x 30.25″ H
Max. window kit length = 48", Min. window kit length = 26.5"
